translations.transtext: 3. A verdict of past insanity may be given. This is another verdict of innocence given in an accusation, based on the fact that the accused was out of his mind when he committed the offense in question and so is absolved of any responsibility for it.
๓. พึงให้ระเบียบที่ให้แก่ภิกษุผู้หายเป็นบ้าแล้ว
3. The procedure (of announcing) no-longer-insane may be given.
